definition: to apply paint, veneer etc/to plaster over/decorative coating/finish/veneer
to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street
decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: Truth needs no colour; beauty , no pencil.
sentences.chinese: 真理不需色彩，美麗不需塗飾。

sentences.english: Some U. S. politicians paint China to be a saber-rattling belligerent.
sentences.chinese: 一些美國政客塗飾中國是武力恫嚇的好戰國家。

sentences.english: He used clear to finish the cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 他用透明漆塗飾那碗櫃。

sentences.english: The peeling plaster must be raked out before painting the wall.
sentences.chinese: 在塗飾牆壁之前必須先將剝落的灰泥刮掉。

sentences.english: Truth needs no color; beauty , no pencil.
sentences.chinese: 真理不需色彩，美麗不需塗飾。

sentences.english: The method of finishing of the cobweb cracked effect leather in the condition high temperature was studied.
sentences.chinese: 系統地研究了高溫蜘蛛網龜裂效應革塗飾方法。

sentences.english: Wood furniture production line of paint finishing lines.
sentences.chinese: 木傢俱生產線之油漆塗飾線。
